msg: Fixes ROL-1474, " Exception (500) occurs when clicks to "Add Ping Target" and some other URL (the double <s:url> problem) bugs the same page. The problem is that CommonPingTargets.jsp was calling the CustomPingTargetAdd action when it should have been calling CommonPingTarget action.
